pullRequest.title: Update LTR translations
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
LEARNER-7671

Update birth year max range to 2020 in profiles.json
Pulled all the latest translations from transifex.

Testing
Testing is pending

beforeCommit.message:
Disable 'MissingTranslation' lint error checks

- LEARNER-7671
- Remove all 'MissingTranslation' tags from source files. While
transifex will automatically remove them from translation files.

afterCommit.message:
Disable 'MissingTranslation' and 'ImpliedQuantity' lint error checks

- LEARNER-7671
- Remove all 'MissingTranslation' and 'ImpliedQuantity' tags from the
source files while from translation files transifex will automatically
remove them when the source files will be pushed from master branch
after merging the PR.

nodes.bodyText: What's the reason of disabling this lint check?
Won't it be better if we mark this option as a warning instead of disabling it?

commit.message:
Update LTR translations

- LEARNER-7671
- Update birth year max range to 2020 in profiles.json
- Pulled all latest translations from transifex.

afterCommit.message:
Make 'MissingTranslation' and 'ImpliedQuantity' as warnings
rather than errors

- LEARNER-7671
- Remove all 'MissingTranslation' and 'ImpliedQuantity' tags from the
source files while from translation files transifex will automatically
remove them when the source files will be pushed from master branch
after merging the PR.

commit.message:
Make 'MissingTranslation' and 'ImpliedQuantity' as warnings.

- LEARNER-7671
- Remove all 'MissingTranslation' and 'ImpliedQuantity' tags from the
source files while from translation files transifex will automatically
remove them when the source files will be pushed from master branch
after merging the PR.
